name: Melody's Nightmare
description:
Game #14 in my "Jammie" series, #2 for the side character "Melody." For the other games, visit https://shibeyfacegames.itch.io/

My entry for WGJ 110: Floating Sky Islands. (I went loose with the theme this time...)

Melody had a strange dream recently. In that dream, an unknown force whispered to her to forget. Even so, Melody struggled to remember and eventually overcame her amnesia. But now, that event may be coming back to haunt her.

  • [Right Mouse] on Next button to advance screens.
  • [AWSD] to move.
  • [Left Mouse] to attack. (Drains Willpower)
  • [Right Mouse] to dash toward cursor.

Willpower will drain from being attacked, staying near temptations, and attacking. Collect Orbs to increase willpower.

Run out of willpower, and it’s the end for Melody!
